00017    Socket() : fd_(-1) {}
00018    Socket(const std::string& name) : fd_(-1), name_(name) {}
00019    
00022    ~Socket() { 
00023       std::cerr << "close(" << fd_ << ")\n";
00024       if ( fd_ > -1 ) close(fd_); 
00025    }
00026    
00031    Socket& operator=( int v ) { fd_ = v; return *this; }
00032    
00036    operator int() const { return fd_; }
00037    
00039    std::string name() const;
00040    int getDescriptor() const { return fd_; }
00041

00043    // Unassignable and uncopyable?
00044    Socket( const Socket& );
00045    Socket& operator=( const Socket& );

00063 template <typename T> bool operator==( const Socket& s, const T& v ) {
00064   return s.getDescriptor() == v;
